channel.title: XServer on Machine Learning
channel.description: Recent content in XServer on Machine Learning

item.title: Setup Remote Access (VNC) of Linux Servers
item.description: Tested in Ubuntu 16.04 desktop Gnome+Unity in Vmware. OBS: pure server will automatically start X in reboot and will lack of something, e.g. Default Terminal etc. FIREWALL # TCP port 5900+N (N is monitorId, starts from 1.) TIGHT.VNC AS SERVER # TightVnc allows us to start from a server without X11 and do everything in command line, remotely. install (either already with or w/o desktop) # sudo su: use root can avoid weird problems, see “ps”.
